Uses of Class
squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.ColorChangeImage

  • Uses of ColorChangeImage in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

    Methods in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx that return ColorChangeImage
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ColorChangeImage TextCellFactory.makeGlyphImage​(char glyph, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
    Given a char and a Color, makes a ColorChangeImage of that colored char so it can be rotated and so on.
    ColorChangeImage TextCellFactory.makeGlyphImage​(char glyph, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color, boolean doubleWidth)
    Given a char and a Color, makes a ColorChangeImage of that colored char so it can be rotated and so on.
    ColorChangeImage TextCellFactory.makeGlyphImage​(char glyph, java.util.Collection<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color> colors, float loopTime, boolean doubleWidth)
    Given a char and a Collection of Color (such as a List that might be produced by SquidColorCenter.gradient(Color, Color)), makes a ColorChangeImage of that char so it can be rotated and so on.
